title: Zimbabwe Bank Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in Zimbabwe increased to 98.07 percent in September from 88.46 percent in August of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in Zimbabwe averaged 17.88 percent from 2011 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 98.07 percent in September of 2022 and a record low of 8.86 percent in September of 2017. In Zimbabwe, the Bank Lending Rate is the sum of minimum nominal lending rates weighted by individual bankâ€™s loan book sizes and published by the Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe. This page provides - Zimbabwe Bank Lending Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe
